post:
Hi All,

Recently I purchased a master reseller hosting package from http://ezpzhosting.co.uk.

The package included a WHMCS license that I do not need. I have confirmed with them that the license could be resold.

I am thinking to sub-lease the license for $7/month, rather than leaving it idle.

License has to be used within EZPZhosting network, so I will include the following shared hosting package:

Disk Space: 3GB  
Bandwidth: 50GB  
Host unlimited domains  
Unlimited databases  
CloudLinux  
R1Soft daily backup  
Softaculous

Location: Dallas, TX (Internap DAL006)  
Rules: generally follow EZPZ TOS & AUP

Comodo Positive SSL is free but you must purchase dedicated IP ($3/month) to use it.

You could use it for your project, or just for development purposes. PM me if interested.  
Pricing and everything else are negotiable. Let me know what you have in mind. 

Thanks all!
